Title: XCopy
Description: Very basic extension to enable Unix-style copy and paste (select to copy, paste with the middle mouse button).
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Very basic extension to enable Unix-style copy and paste (select to copy, paste with the middle mouse button).

Very basic extension (50 lignes of code) to allow Unix-style copy and paste: select text to copy to an auxilliary clipboard and press the middle mouse button to paste (at the mouse cursor location). Very simple, but I personally could not live without this!

Note: this is an additional copy and paste mechanism, the windows clipboard is never touched. And
in my experience, this is what makes this infinitely better than autohotkey scripts which use the windows clipboard (of course, the drawback is that it's not system-wide).
